4.description: Richard of Gloucester uses manipulation and murder to gain the English throne.

16.name: As You Like It
16.description: After the overthrowing of Duke Senior by his tyrannical brother, Senior's daughter Rosalind disguises herself as a man and sets out to find her banished father while also counseling her clumsy suitor Orlando in the art of wooing.

18.description: An orphan in early 19th century England escapes the poorhouse only to fall among a gang of pickpockets in London.
